text: Tamagrama antahi'zana tamagrane tamagehe'zane, kini vahetamimo'zane, kva vahe'tamimo'zane, maka vahe'motanema Juda mopafima me'nea kumatamimpine Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea ne'onse kantamimpinema, mana nentake zantamima kre mnavu ofama hu'naza avu'ava zankura, tamagrama antahi'zana Ra Anumzamofo antahi'zampina omanegeno hago agekanine huta nehazafi?
